meanings.definition: The act of reaching a destination.
meanings.sent1: The arrival of the mail brought joy to the household.
meanings.sent2: We eagerly awaited the arrival of our friends from out of town.
meanings.sent3: The arrival of the pizza delivery guy was like a hero's entrance.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room upon her arrival, like a burst of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The arrival of the first snowfall painted the town in a blanket of white.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that has arrived or come.
meanings.sent1: The new arrival at school quickly made friends.
meanings.sent2: The arrivals at the airport were greeted by their loved ones.
meanings.sent3: The arrival of the unexpected guest added excitement to the party.
meanings.sent4: His arrival at the meeting turned heads, as he was known for his charisma.
meanings.sent5: The arrival of spring brought new life to the garden.
